title: Lavish 1bed on Chestnut Hill Ave w/ Ht/hw, no rental fee
map_address: Chestnut Hill Ave near Academy Hill Rd.
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 1281297', 'Rent: $1,950 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 10/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Located right on Chestnut Hill Ave, near Brighton Center,extra large 1 bd.', 'this apartment features hardwood floors, one over sized bedroom, a over sized  living room, fairly modern eat-in kitchen  and bathroom.', 'Coin-up washer and dryer is available for use in the basement of the building.', 'Less than 5 minutes away from the nearest 86, 65, 57, and 52 bus stop.', 'Rent INCLUDES the HEAT AND HOT WATER.', 'FEATURES', 'Carpet', 'Cat Friendly', 'Heat and Hot Water Included', 'Laundry in Building', 'Lots of Light', 'Near Green Line', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Big kitchen with a dishwasher', 'Cat ok', 'Heat and hot water included in rent', 'Street Parking', 'Laundry in building', 'Carpet throughout apartment', 'Newly renovated bathroomFOR MORE EXCLUSIVE LISTINGS VISIT: <URL>', 'Anti discrimination Policy-', 'All apartments advertised by Prestige Rental Solutions are available on an equal opportunity basis.', 'All real estate advertised herein is subject to the federal Fair Housing Act and the Massachusetts state law, M.G.L. c.151B, which makes it illegal to advertise any preference, limitation, or discrimination , or discriminate against any person because of race, color, religion, sex, disability ,family status, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, genetic information , ancestry, martial status, national origin or because the person is a member of the  armed forces.']
